data.description:
scouts aren't too hot right now, and 150s are particularly rough: they do get the 3 tap, which is nice, but you need 100% accuracy - not easy to consistently get with all the flinch you'll be experiencing. it also has no good right column perks - like at all. in general, hard to justify over a hand cannon.
recommended mw: handling

data.description:
it has good perks, but high impact scout damage in pve just sucks. it will take forever to kill anything, and your major/boss damage is nonexistent. if you need a kinetic scout for nightfalls or other far-distance content, do the first mission of the new light campaign and get the curated night watch.
recommended mw: reload
